Title: Limits the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority with regard to the number of tolls charged on trucks
Summary: Limits the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority with regard to the number of tolls charged on trucks and the authority's power to raise its toll schedule.
LawCode: Amd §§1704-a & 1630, add §1704-b, V & T L; amd §553, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public authorities law, in relation to limiting the number of tolls charged on trucks and limiting the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority's power to raise its toll schedule
